alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:44PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Otero, central Las Animas, and southeastern Pueblo Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 243 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Manzanola to 6 miles north of Delhi to 11 miles northeast of Aguilar. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford, Swink, Delhi, Higbee, Model, Timpas, Thatcher and Tyrone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
